feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-26T20:02:11.822845Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;超导新闻：声称的内容以及证据似乎有多有力</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/blog-post/writing-superconductor-news</id>; <updated>;2023-0 7-26T19:01:47.121269Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/blog-post/writing-superconductor-news"/>; <author>; <name>;etiam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=etiam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#superconductor-news -whats-claimed-and-how-strong-the-evidence-seems-to-be" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; Overture 地图基金会发布开放地图数据集</stitle>; <id>;https://overturemaps.org/overture-maps-foundation-releases-first-world-wide-open-map-dataset/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T16:01:47.248492Z</updated>; <link href="https://overturemaps.org/overture-maps-foundation-releases-first-world-wide-open-map- dataset/"/>; <author>; <name>;chippy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chippy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://overturemaps.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/16/2023/07/overture_places-1024x641.png" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;Overture 地图基金会发布了第一个开放地图数据集，其中包括全球近 6000 万个地点的四层开放地图数据。该数据集将成为导航和基于位置的应用程序的基础元素。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#overture-maps-foundation-releases-open-map-dataset" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36879461" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;解析 Google 的网络环境完整性规范</stitle>; <id>;https://vivaldi.com/blog/googles-new-dangerous-web-environment-integrity-spec/ </id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.250534Z</更新>; <link href="https://vivaldi.com/blog/googles-new-dangerous-web-environment-integrity-spec/"/>; <作者>; <name>;dagurp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dagurp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<im g src =“https://vivaldi.com/wp-content/uploads/Toxic_google-980x551.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Google 正在制定一项新的网络环境完整性规范，该规范引发了争议。该规范旨在为网站提供 API 来确定所使用的浏览器和平台是否可信。但是，所提出的解决方案被认为非常糟糕，并且已与网站的 DRM 进行了比较。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unpacking-googles-web-environment-integrity-specification" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875940" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何构建有毒软件团队</stitle>; <id>;https://badsoftwareadvice.substack.com/p/how-to-build-有毒-软件-团队</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T19：01：47.251314Z </更新>; <link href="https://badsoftwareadvice.substack.com/p/how-to-build-token-software-teams"/>; <作者>; <name>;tate</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tate</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/f_auto,q_auto:best,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbadsoftwareadvice.substack.com%2Ftwitter%2Fsubscribe-card.jpg%3Fv%3D1727743778%26version%3D9" style="width: 220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;要在团队中营造有毒文化，领导者应该阻止团队达成和平，并创造一个只有他们的批准才重要的环境。他们应该使批准不频繁且不一致，将失败归咎于个人，并且难以接触和不可预测。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-build-token-software-teams" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36882767" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;智能合约安全领域指南</stitle>; <id>;https://scsfg.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.2 52054Z</updated>; <link href="https://scsfg.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;dmuhs</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmuhs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;智能合约安全现场指南是一项免费资源，旨在提供编写安全智能合约的知识、见解和最佳实践。它是独立、公正的，并且不需要个人信息即可访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#smart-contract-security-field-guide" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36879991" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;稳定扩散XL 1.0</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/26/stability-ai-releases-its-latest-image-generate-model-stable-diffusion-xl-1-0/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.253648Z</updated>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com /2023/07/26/stability-ai-releases-its-latest-image-generate-model-stable-diffusion-xl-1-0/"/>; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/0 4/064.jpg?w=600" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;Stability AI 发布了 Stable Diffusion XL 1.0，这是迄今为止最先进的文本到图像模型。与前代产品相比，该模型提供了鲜艳而准确的色彩、更好的对比度、阴影和照明。它可以在几秒钟内生成完整的 1 兆像素分辨率图像，并且可以定制以微调概念和风格。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stable-diffusion-xl-1-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880756" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MOS 6502非法操作码如何工作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pagetable.com/?p=39</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T12:01:47.254384Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.pagetable.com/?p=39"/>; <author>; <name>;hasheddan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=hasheddan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.weihenstephan.org/~michaste/pagetable/6502/6502_small.png" style="width: 220px; height: 271px;" />;<br />;MOS 6502 的原始 NMOS 版本用于 Commodore 64、Apple II 和任天堂娱乐系统 (NES) 等计算机，因其非法操作码而闻名。这些操作码虽然未由架构定义，但仍然可以执行有用的功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-mos-6502-illegal-opcodes-work" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875816" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;波音公司在 Starliner 上损失了 1.1 亿美元，看不到载人飞行</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/boeing-has-now-lost-1-1-billion-on-starliner-with-no-crew-flight-in-sight/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T16:01:47 .255804Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/boeing-has-now-lost-1-1-billion-on-starliner-with-no-crew-flight-in-sight/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Photo-May-18-3-55-30-PM-800x534.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;波音公司的 Starliner 计划遭受了额外损失，美国宇航局尚未确定载人航天器的潜在发射日期。该计划总共损失了 11 亿美元，主要是由于发射延迟和技术问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#boeing-has-now-lost-1-1b-on-starliner-with-no-crew-flight-in-sight" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36879769" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <ent ry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;白日梦对我的影响有多大</stitle>; <id>;https://sunghoyahng.substack.com/p/how-too-much-daydreaming-affected</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T14:01:47.256474Z</updated>; <link href="https://sungho yahng.substack.com/p/how-too-much-daydreaming-affected"/>; <author>; <name>;SunghoYahng</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SunghoYahng</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/f_auto,q_auto:best,fl_progressive:steep/https% 3A%2F%2Fsunghoyahng.substack.com%2Ftwitter%2Fsubscribe-card.jpg%3Fv%3D323842631%26version%3D9" style="宽度：220px；高度：115px；" />;<br />;我相信我正在经历一种称为适应不良白日梦（MD）的认知现象。它没有得到官方认可，但它极大地影响了我的生活和生产力。我的白日梦无处不在，干扰了我的日常工作，让我很难集中注意力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-too-much-daydreaming-affected-me" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860570" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人们为软件付费的世界</stitle>; <id>;https://1sub.dev/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T11:01:47.257807Z</updated>; <link href="https://1sub.dev/"/>; <author>; <name>;robalni</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=robalni</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;软件开发必须以某种方式获得资金。 1Sub.dev 试图通过让开发者合作来为用户提供更多的钱来解决这个问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-world-where-people-pay-for-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875513" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;模具2.0</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T13:01:47.258479Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0"/>; <作者>; <name>;fo mine3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fomine3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/afd44f1e96aebe8e924c22adeefc6fc7c2e1d9a3707116804f162bb6a567c4c1/rui314/m旧/releases/tag/v2.0.0" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Mold 2.0.0 是我们高速链接器的新主要版本。为了扩大我们的用户群，我们已将许可证从 AGPL 转换为 MIT。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mold-2-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36876783" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;S研究显示草甘膦会损害大黄蜂的学习</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07-glyphosate-impairs-bumblebees.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.259141Z</updated>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-07-glyphosate-impair s-bumblebees.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/glyphosate-impairs-lea.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：96px ;” />;<br />;康斯坦茨大学的生物学家发现，接触草甘膦的熊蜂会损害厌恶学习能力。这种学习障碍可能会增加觅食者的死亡率，并对群体的成功产生负面影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-shows-glyphosate-impairs-learning-in-bumblebees" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880639" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;家庭录音正在扼杀音乐：当音乐行业对盒式磁带发动战争时</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/home-taping-is-killing-music-when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette-tape.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T08:01 :47.259816Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/home-taping-is-killing-music-when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette-tape.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rcarmo </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://cdn8.openculture.com/2023/07/24205918/tometaping.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：143px；" />;<br />;20 世纪 80 年代英国臭名昭著的“家庭录音正在扼杀音乐”运动的目标是那些通过广播录制歌曲而不是购买唱片的人。然而，该活动收效甚微，许多人认为这是无稽之谈。家庭录音和盒式磁带在当时的音乐消费和文化中发挥了重要作用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#home-taping-is-killing-music-when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36874275" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;内存复制狩猎</stitle>; <id>;https://tigerbeetle.com/blog/2023-07-26-copy-hunting/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T13:01:47.260491Z</updated>; <link href="https://tigerbeetle.com/blog /2023-07-26-copy-hunting/"/>; <author>; <name>;polyrand</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=polyrand</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://tigerbeetle.com/assets/matklad.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;LLVM IR 是理解和优化代码的强大工具。它提供了接近汇编语言的低级代码表示，但也具有使其更加人性化的高级功能。通过分析 LLVM IR，开发人员可以识别并优化性能问题，例如隐式内存复制和不必要的代码重复。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#memory-copy-hunting" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36876396" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国前情报官员称，进行了“数十年”的秘密 UFO 计划</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/jul/26/ufo-hearing-congress-evidence-david-grusch</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T19:08:47.261157Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian. com/us-news/2023/jul/26/ufo-hearing-congress-evidence-david-grusch"/>; <author>; <name>;c420</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=c420</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/d2811800eceecd4 e7f7f394ced0fd50225ae35d4/0_273_8192_4918/master/8192.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;一位前情报官员表示，美国政府实施了一项“数十年”计划来收集坠毁的不明飞行物并对其进行逆向工程。这位官员戴维·格鲁什 (David Grusch) 在周三的国会听证会上提出了这些说法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-conducted-multi-decade-secret-ufo-program-ex-intelligence-official-says" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36883198" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JEP 400：默认为 UTF-8</stitle>; <id>;https://openjdk.org/jeps/400</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.261843Z</updated>; <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/400"/>; <作者>; <名称>; znpy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=znpy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;指定 UTF-8 作为标准 Java API 的默认字符集。此更改可确保所有实现、操作系统、区域设置和配置之间的行为一致，从而使 Java 程序更具可预测性和可移植性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jep-400-utf-8-by-default" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880069" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;重新思考窗口管理</stitle>; <id>;https://blogs.gnome.org/tbernard/2023/07/26/rethinking-window-management/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.262494Z</updated>; <link href="https://blogs.gnome.org/tbernard/2023/07/26 /rethinking-window-management/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ayoisaiah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ayoisaiah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogs.gnome.org/tbernard/files/2023/07/2023-04-26-17-29-38-132-825x5 10.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：136px；" />;<br />;窗口管理是计算领域长期存在的挑战。随着窗口数量和大小的增加，传统的窗口系统存在局限性。 GNOME 设计团队一直致力于开发一种名为 Mosaic 的新窗口管理模式，它结合了平铺和浮动的最佳部分。它旨在提供一种默认行为，根据应用程序和可用屏幕空间自动调整窗口位置和大小。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rethinking-window-management" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880235" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;随着需求的增加，墨西哥的传家宝玉米品种正在复苏</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nbcnews.com/news/latino/heirloom-corn-organic-mexico-resurging-induscial-white-corn-rcna96412</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T16:01:47.263132Z</updated>; <link href="https://www .nbcnews.com/news/latino/heirloom-corn-organic-mexico-resurging-industrial-white-corn-rcna96412"/>; <作者>; <name>;DocFeind</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DocFeind</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/图片/上传/t_fit-760w,f_auto,q_auto:best/rockcms/2023-07/230726-mexico-corn-mn-0943-8d5fd9.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 151px;" />;<br />;墨西哥的传家宝玉米品种的需求正在回升，农民们继续保留这些品种，而不是工业化生产的白玉米。 Juan Vargas 农场的 50 英亩土地中，有 20 英亩种植的是彩色祖传玉米，其利润比白色品种更高。寻求有机农产品的消费者和世界各地的厨师正在推动这些传家宝菌株的市场，这些菌株用于墨西哥玉米饼和托斯塔达等传统墨西哥菜肴。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mexico-s-heirloom-corn-strains-are-resurging-amid-more-demand" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36878836" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;编程 20 年（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://flooey.org/twentyyearsofprogramming.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T08:01:47.263769Z</updated>; <link href="https://flooey.org/twentyyearsofprogramming.html"/>; <author >; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;20 年前，我在佩塔卢马的一家 6 人初创公司开始了我的第一份专业编程工作。尽管发生了一些变化，但代码的实际编写仍然与当时相同。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#20-years-of-programming-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36858603" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;苹果对 App Store 规则臭名昭著，却给了微信免费通行证（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://reclaimthenet.org/apple-app-store-wechat-c​​hina</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T19:01:47.264436Z</updated>; <link href="https://reclaimthenet.org/apple-app-store-wechat-c​​hina"/>; <作者>; <name>;spenvo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=spenvo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://reclaimthenet.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/wechat.png" style="width: 220px; height: 152px;" />;<br />;Apple 对 iPhone 的要求非常严格，决定用户可以运行哪些应用程序。然而，他们似乎对中国的微信应用程序破例，该应用程序通过小程序的传播打破了应用商店的规则。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-s-inknownly-strict-on-app-store-rules-but-gives-wechat-a-free-pass-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36882467" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ent ry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;文学小说的生、死和来世</stitle>; <id>;https://www.esquire.com/entertainment/books/a44496450/literary-fiction-death-digital-age/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T15:01:47.265123 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.esquire.com/entertainment/books/a44496450/literary-fiction-death-digital-age/"/>; <作者>; <name>;lermontov</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lermontov</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod/图片/literaryfiction-1-64b01bf2eb6ac.jpg?resize=2048:*" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;在互联网时代，我们不断接触数字设备和信息，使得我们很难完全沉浸在文学小说中。然而，曾经有一段时间，《Esquire》等杂志在宣传和出版短篇小说和长篇小说方面发挥了重要作用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-life-death-and-afterlife-of-literary-fiction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36870734" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;西尼德·奥康纳去世</stitle>; <id>;https://www.irishtimes.com/culture/music/2023/07/26/sinead-oconnor-acclaimed-dublin-singer-dies-ged-56/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T18:01:47.266477Z</updated>; <link href ="https://www.irishtimes.com/culture/music/2023/07/26/sinead-oconnor-acclaimed-dublin-singer-dies-ged-56/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jbegley</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jbegley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.irishtimes.com /resizer/bJaZZVEKH0AVWZ3-I4peNw7aBK8=/600x400/filters:格式(jpg):质量(70)/cloudfront-eu-central-1.images.arcpublishing.com/irishtimes/4ERWPSLUXBEJLHXRGQYHXOZ2DI.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; 高度: 147px;" />;<br />;以热门单曲“Nothing Compares 2 U”而闻名的都柏林表演者西尼德·奥康纳 (Sinead O'Connor) 去世。她发行了 10 张录音室专辑，并在她的职业生涯中获得了无数奖项。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sinead-oconnor-has-died" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881814" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们对富足的信念从何而来？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.discoursemagazine.com/abundance/2023/07/19/where-did-our-belief-in-abundance-come-from/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T06:01:47.267154Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.discoursemagazine. com/abundance/2023/07/19/where-did-our-belief-in-abundance-come-from/"/>; <author>; <name>;elsewhen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=elsewhen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.discoursemagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07 /Abundance-Venice.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;西罗马灭亡后，罗马帝国的崩溃导致了一种衰败感，并相信人类的堕落已经蒙蔽了我们的感官和智慧。然而，文艺复兴和古希腊哲学和科学的重新发现激发了人们对自然的好奇心和对进步的信念。启蒙运动进一步挑战了既定的正统观念，并引发了对世界的实证研究，最终导致了皇家学会的成立和对有用知识的追求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#where-did-our-belief-in-abundance-come-from" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36856215" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;英国版“在线危害法案”希望在没有正当程序的情况下预过滤内容</stitle>; <id>;https://easydns.com/blog/2023/07/26/uk-version-of-online-harms-bill-wants-to-prefilter-content-without-due-process/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T18:01:47.26784 4Z</updated>; <link href="https://easydns.com/blog/2023/07/26/uk-version-of-online-harms-bill-wants-to-prefilter-content-without-due-process/"/>; <author>; <name>;StuntPope</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=StuntPope</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://easydns.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/minority-report-1-e1690389767969.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：112px；" />;<br />;英国计划中的“网络危害法案”包含“事先限制”的概念，这可能导致内容在未经正当程序的情况下在发布前被禁止或屏蔽。这可能会对加密消息服务产生影响，并可能通过扼杀言论自由从根本上改变在线通信。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#uk-version-of-online-harms-bill-wants-to-prefilter-content-without-due-process" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881153" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;EXGBoost：Elixir 中的梯度提升</stitle>; <id>;https://dockyard.com/blog/2023/07/18/introducing-exgboost-gradient-boosting-in-elixir</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T17:01:47.268564Z</updated >; <link href="https://dockyard.com/blog/2023/07/18/introducing-exgboost-gradient-boosting-in-elixir"/>; <author>; <name>;clessg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clessg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.dockyard.com/dockyard_com/introducing -exgboost-1b9c6625-e2bc-4562-8c3b-7dfd7a34b8d5-large.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：144px；" />;<br />;EXGBoost 是一个库，填补了 Elixir 中实现决策树的空白。它为 Elixir Nx 生态系统带来了一个关键的缺失部分，并且是一个用于训练简单且可解释的机器学习模型的强大框架。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#exgboost-gradient-boosting-in-elixir" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880652" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Quad9 在索尼罚款 1 万欧元后在全球范围内封锁盗版网站</stitle>; <id>;https://torrentfreak.com/quad9-blocks-pirate-site-globally-after-sony-demanded-e10000-fine-230725/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T16:01:47.269276Z</updated>; <link href=" https://torrentfreak.com/quad9-blocks-pirate-site-globally-after-sony-demanded-e10000-fine-230725/"/>; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;索尼音乐获得了一项禁令，命令 DNS 解析器 Quad9 阻止盗版网站 Canna.to。 Quad9 反对该禁令，但输掉了法律诉讼，导致需要在全球范围内屏蔽该网站。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quad9-blocks-pirate-site-globally-after-sony-demanded-eur10k-fine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36878867" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
